de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation
Interface IAgentLocator

All Known Implementing Classes:
ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation, ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation2D, ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation3D
public interface IAgentLocator

This interface defines methods agents will expect from the simulation environment. These methods are glue methods to allow the agents to access MASON specific functionality.

Copyright 2009 Joerg Hoehne

Author:
hoehne (Jörg Höhne)

createVisual

IAgentVisualization createVisual(IVisualAgent agent)
Create a visualization object for the given agent. The type of visualization is not known due to the usage of different simulation environments.

Parameters:
agent - The agent for which the visualization object will be created for.
Returns:
The visualization object.

Some information.
